dc_title_s: Cadastral riparian maps of land grants and leases, Ocean County
dc_description_s: This set of five maps consists of block print and hand written maps on paper-covered linen. Map 1 shows Barnegat Bay along the mainland of Ocean County and the southern half of Long Beach Island. It also depicts a partial index to more granular maps of the area. Map 2 shows a complete view of Barnegat Bay along several counties of the mainland and the entirety of Long Beach Island. Map 3 shows Barnegat Bay along the Ocean County mainland and the northern half of Long Beach Island. Map 4 shows Point Pleasant along the Manasquan River. Map 5 shows Toms River township and Island Heights along Toms River. The maps are torn and have damaged edges. The earliest date is 1882, with additional land lease dates added up until 1943.|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
